```{r}
SciViews:: R
```
```{r}
zooplankton_sub <- filter(zooplankton, class %in% c("Poecilostomatoid", "Calanoid", "Cyclopoid", "Harpacticoid"))
```

##ecd en fonction de l'aire
```{r}
chart(zooplankton, formula = ecd ~ area %col=% perimeter) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
library(ggridges)
```

##périmètre selon les classes
```{r}
chart(zooplankton, class ~ perimeter) +
  geom_density_ridges()
```

##axe mineur de l'ellipsoïde en fonction de la classe
```{r}
chart(zooplankton, formula = min ~ class) + 
  geom_violin() + 
  coord_flip()
```

##
```{r}
chart(zooplankton_sub, ~ elongation %alpha=% class) + 
  geom_histogram(bins=30) 
```

##
```{r}
chart(zooplankton_sub,formula=~ elongation)+ 
  geom_density()
```


##
```{r}
chart(zooplankton_sub, formula= compactness ~ transparency %alpha=% class ) + 
  geom_point(na.rm = TRUE)
```
